vulnerabilities.title: DOM Clobbering Gadget found in Rspack's AutoPublicPathRuntimeModule that leads to XSS
vulnerabilities.description:
Hi, Rspack|Webpack developer team!

## Summary
We discovered a DOM Clobbering vulnerability in Webpackâ€™s AutoPublicPathRuntimeModule. The DOM Clobbering gadget in the module can lead to cross-site scripting (XSS) in web pages where scriptless attacker-controlled HTML elements (e.g., an img tag with an unsanitized name attribute) are present.

We found the real-world exploitation of this gadget in the Canvas LMS which allows XSS attack happens through an javascript code compiled by Webpack (the v
